differentiators.claim: Comprehensive biometric ecosystem with advanced health screening
differentiators.explanation: Provides contactless attendance tracking with integrated health safety features including mask detection, temperature detection, and thermal scanning - critical for post-pandemic workplace safety
evidence: Advanced biometric capabilities such as mask detection, temperature detection and thermal scanning
Contactless capability is also critically important to workplace hygiene and safety including sanitation, social distancing and psychological safety

differentiators.claim: Massive scale distributed workforce management across 1,000+ locations
differentiators.explanation: Specifically designed to handle enterprise-scale operations with thousands of distributed locations, addressing complex multi-location workforce challenges
evidence: ADP SecurTime helps you manage productivity of your employees across 1,000+ locations
Manage 24×7 schedules, absences, productivity, overtime and analytics across vast, distributed locations

differentiators.claim: Comprehensive workforce type coverage including gig and contingent workers
differentiators.explanation: Handles all employment types in a single platform, addressing the modern diverse workforce reality that many solutions struggle with
evidence: SecurTime helps you track and manage your full-time, part-time, contract, gig and contingent employees real-time
